segments.text: Looking into this kitchen, I notice the warm light from the daytime window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is polishing a plate, her apron tied neatly around her dress.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet is running full blast, and the sink is spilling water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear or see that overflow ruining the cabinets?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is spreading, and it's right under her feet—slippery disaster waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the kids are up to no good with that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on a shaky stool, one hand in the jar, the other holding a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is reaching up, excited for her cookie, I bet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is so irresponsible; the stool could collapse any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the water damage—it's going to be a nightmare to clean up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside garden is tidy, but inside it's chaos she doesn't see.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to yell and stop this before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just can't believe she's so unaware of the dangers around her.
segments.speaker: PAR
